next_state: -= Kitchen =- You've just walked into a kitchen. You make out a fridge. The fridge contains a fried white tuna, a carrot, a yellow bell pepper, a white onion and a raw red tuna. You see an oven. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a table. You see a cookbook and a knife on the table. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best? You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a counter. On the counter you make out a fried red hot pepper, a raw red potato, a green bell pepper and a yellow apple. If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a stove. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! There is an open plain door leading west. There is an exit to the north. > -= Kitchen =-0/15

admissible_commands: take green bell pepper from counter
take red hot pepper from counter
take yellow bell pepper from fridge
